automation_yaml:
id: 'morning_office_living_room_lights'
alias: Morning Office & Living Room Lights
description: "At 6:00 AM every day, set the Office Wled strip to 50% brightness and turn on the Living Room light to 30% brightness, giving you a consistent, gentle wake‑up lighting in your office and living room."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '06:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 50
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 30
